name: Green Backup – Backup WordPress, Clone, & Migration Solution (Local, Google Drive, Dropbox, Amazon S3, etc.)
author: GreenWPX

sections.description:
Green Backup is your ultimate safeguard for WordPress backup, clone, and migration needs. this intuitive plugin makes it effortless for WordPress users to protect their online world.

Experience seamless backups to cloud platforms including Dropbox, Google Drive, FTP/SFTP, Amazon S3, Wasabi, OneDrive, Google Cloud, Storage, Backblaze B2, Microsoft Azure Blob, DigitalOcean Space, and more. Migrate or clone your WordPress site between domains or hosts without downtime, backup your site locally or schedule backups as you need.

Green Backup is designed to keep your WordPress powered site safe from hacks, accidental damage, server crashes, and to streamline migrations between hosts or domains.

Key Features:

  • Comprehensive Backup Options: Back up your entire site or select parts, ensuring complete protection.
  • Easy Migration & Cloning: Move, migrate, or clone your WordPress site between domains or hosts with zero downtime.
  • Scheduled Backups: Automate your backup routine for peace of mind, with the freedom to set the schedule that works for you.
  • Cloud & Local Storage: Store backups on popular cloud services (like Google Drive, Amazon S3, Dropbox) or locally.
  • One-Click Restore: Quickly restore your site to a previous state with just one click.

Why Choose Green Backup:

  • Intuitive Dashboard: Manage your backups with ease through a user-friendly interface.
  • Flexible Storage Options: Whether you prefer cloud or local storage, Green Backup fits your workflow.
  • One-Click Backups: Safeguard your entire WordPress site effortlessly.
  • Multi-Storage Solutions: Flexibility to store backups locally or on various cloud services.
  • Locked Backups: Protect backups from accidental deletions with our lock feature.
  • Schedule Like a Pro: Set automatic backup schedules tailored to your workflow.
  • Historical Backup Visibility: Easily manage backup versions with detailed information.

Make Green Backup your trusted partner and never worry about your site’s safety and availability. Start today and enjoy stress-free WordPress management.

Getting Started

  1. Choose Your Backup Details:

    • Install Green Backup and open the dashboard.
    • Select what to back up and decide where to store your backup.

  2. Set Your Schedule:

    • Determine backup frequency using the intuitive interface.

  3. Sit Back and Relax:

    • With Green Backup configured, your WordPress site is in safe hands.

For a step-by-step video guide on installing and setting up Green Backup, watch our tutorial:
[How to Install Green Backup for WordPress]

Pricing

Unlock the full potential of your WordPress backups by choosing the plan that fits your needs:

  • (Free Plan): Unlimited sites, backups, and migrations. Backups locally.

  • Pro Version: Backups locally or on various cloud services like: Dropbox, Google Drive, FTP/SFTP, Amazon S3, Wasabi, OneDrive, Google Cloud, Storage, Backblaze B2, Microsoft Azure Blob, DigitalOcean Space.

Support

For any issues or queries, visit our help desk or contact us at support@greenwpx.com. We’re committed to resolving your concerns promptly.

Credits

Green Backup is developed and maintained by https://greenwpx.com .

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPL v2 or later – see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html for det
sections.installation:
1. Upload the green-backup folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Visit the ‘Green Backup’ menu in the WordPress dashboard to configure settings.

For a step-by-step video guide on installing and setting up Green Backup, watch our tutorial:
How to Install Green Backup for WordPress
sections.faq:
I need more features. Can I scale up my Green Backup plan?

Certainly! Upgrading your Green Backup plan is a breeze. You only pay the difference between your current plan and the one you’re upgrading to. Head over to our customer area, and you’ll find a straightforward upgrade pathway

Who do I turn to if I hit a snag with Green Backup?

Our dedicated support team is your go-to resource for any bumps in the road. Just visit our help desk, search our resources, or raise a support ticket. We’re committed to resolving your queries without delay.

How does Green Backup define a “site” for licensing purposes?

We view a “site” as a unique WordPress installation on a single URL/domain. In a WordPress multisite setup, each site within the network is regarded individually for licensing purposes.

Is Green Backup functional on all types of WordPress hosting environments?

Green Backup is versatile and engineered to operate smoothly across a diverse range of WordPress-compatible hosting environments. Should you encounter any hosting-related challenges, our technical support is at your disposal.

Can I scale up my Green Backup plan for more features?

Yes! Upgrading is simple. Visit our website or the customer area in your WordPress dashboard for easy plan upgrades.

What if I encounter problems with Green Backup?

Our dedicated support team is here to help you with any issues. Contact us through our support portal or email us at support@greenwpx.com for swift assistance.

Does Green Backup work on all WordPress hosting environments?

Absolutely! Green Backup is designed to work across all WordPress-compatible hosting solutions. If you face any hosting-related issues, our support team is ready to assist.

Can I store my backups on cloud services?

Yes, Green Backup supports multiple cloud storage options including Google Drive, Amazon S3, and Dropbox, among others, for secure and convenient backup storage solutions.
